hexstrike-ai.description: HexStrike AI v6.0 - Advanced Cybersecurity Automation Platform with 150+ security tools and 12+ AI agents

installation_instructions.step_1: Copy this configuration to your Claude Desktop config file
installation_instructions.step_3: Start the HexStrike Docker container: docker-compose up -d
installation_instructions.step_5: Verify connection by asking Claude to run: 'Test HexStrike AI connection'

security_notes.warning: This tool provides AI agents with powerful system access
security_notes.recommendation: Run in isolated environments or dedicated security testing VMs
security_notes.monitoring: Monitor AI agent activities through the real-time dashboard
security_notes.legal: Only use for authorized penetration testing, bug bounty programs, CTF competitions, and security research
